meanings.sent1: My dad loves to tinker with old gismos in his workshop.
meanings.sent2: The new gismos in the store caught my eye with their shiny buttons.
meanings.sent3: The gismos in the kitchen drawer seem to multiply on their own!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a maze of interconnected gismos, each serving a specific purpose.
meanings.sent5: The gismos hummed softly, a symphony of mechanical harmony.

meanings.sent1: She always carries a variety of handy gismos in her purse.

meanings.sent3: His collection of quirky gismos never fails to make me smile.
meanings.sent4: The gismos on his keychain jingled as he walked down the street.
meanings.sent5: The tiny gismos fit perfectly in the palm of her hand.

meanings.definition: A piece of technology or electronic device
meanings.sent1: The latest gismos on the market promise to make life easier.
meanings.sent2: Children today are growing up surrounded by high-tech gismos.
meanings.sent3: The futuristic gismos in the sci-fi movie seemed almost magical.
meanings.sent4: His room was filled with blinking gismos that lit up the darkness.
